= MPD =

The systemd service doesn't work for whatever reason. The application must be run like so: 
`mpd --systemd`


= Playlists =

Saving / Exporting Playlists::
:: `mpc save <name>`

Loading Playlist::
:: `mpc load <name>`

Removing Playlists::
:: `mpc rm <name>`

= Updating =
Updating::
::`mpc update`
